address: 98-158 Edgewood Avenue New Haven, CT 06511, USA
description:
Dwight/Edgewood neighborhood management meeting tonight. This is your chance to voice your concerns to your alderman, LCI representative and new haven police district manager.

Tonight at 630 at the Edgewood police substation at Edgewood ave and day street.

Please come and help make your neighborhood better!
Tree branches need trimmed as they are rubbing against building.
Please add a bike rack on the sidewalk in front of Happiness Lab at The Grove, near lower Chapel at State St. There is very little bike parking in this area and it fills up pretty quickly.

The pedestrian crosswalk markings have completely worn away here, both on William and on Olive. They are in dire need of re-painting. No one EVER yields to pedestrians at this crosswalk. A "yield to pedestrians" free-standing sign would go a long way here, or at least a posted sidewalk sign.
Large pothole near 45 Knollwood.  It seems if you go out to fix one pothole on the street if yu see more that you would fix them.  This street needs serious work.

description: New potholes from failed patches

The pedestrian crosswalk markings have completely worn away here, both on William and on Olive. They are in dire need of re-painting. No one EVER yields to pedestrians at this crosswalk. A "yield to pedestrians" free-standing sign would go a long way here, or at least a posted sidewalk sign.
Large pothole near 45 Knollwood.  It seems if you go out to fix one pothole on the street if yu see more that you would fix them.  This street needs serious work.
